title: Negotiation
summary: Negotiation is a dialogue between two or more people or parties intended to reach a beneficial outcome over one or more issues where a conflict exists with respect to at least one of these issues. Negotiation is an interaction and process between entities who aspire to agree on matters of. For example: Abby is seeking information that only Marg possesses, but Abby still owes Marg a shot therefore Marg is not so willing to give up said information.  In order for Abby to receive said information, a “negotiation” must take place.
